name: Master Blacksmith
description: A muscular dwarf with soot-covered hands and a leather apron, hammering away at red-hot metal.

dialogue.greeting: Ah, a customer! Looking for quality weapons and armor?

responses.hello: Welcome to my forge! I craft the finest weapons in the land.
responses.weapons: I have swords, axes, and daggers. All made with the best steel.
responses.armor: Need protection? I've got shields and armor to keep you safe.
responses.repair: Bring me your damaged gear, I'll fix it good as new.
responses.bye: May your blade stay sharp, adventurer!
